channel.title: -=-=- flattenedcraft.no-ip.net -=-=- [1.2.5] [24/7] [pvp] [survival] [200 slots]
channel.description:
[center][u][size=36pt]FlattenedCraft[/size][/u] Flattened-craft was established 2 years ago as a friendly, free server for my friends it quickly grow and grow. Last year (2011) I decided that it was time to bring flattened-craft to the public but before it went online we had a huge server melt down and we have only just got the server back online a few months ago. This is why i ask if any one would like to be admin please comment. I hope to see you on Flattened-Craft very soon.
[u]What We offer[/u]
- Bukkit Plenty Of Fantastic User Friendly Plugins
- 24/7 Up Time Dedicated Server
- Friendly Staff Very Friendly Staff, Who Care
- Factions Great Your Own Faction
Server Specs
16 GB Of DDR3 RAM 2T. Harddrive Intel core i7-3610QM 3.3 GHz This Allows The Server To Hold Up To 200 Slots And More
Server Rules
NO GRIEFING (You May Grief Other Factions) NO MODS OR HACKS NO SPAM LISTEN TO ALL STAFF NO OUTSIDE SERVER ADVERTISEMENTS RESPECT OTHERS HAVE FUN Server Info
[size=36pt][u]IP - flattenedcraft.no-ip.net[/u][/size]
Our Official Web Site : http://flattenedcraft.enjin.com [/center]

[center][size=36pt]FlattenedCraft[/size]
Flattened-craft was established 2 years ago as a friendly, free server for my friends it quickly grow and grow. Last year (2011) I decided that it was time to bring flattened-craft to the public but before it went online we had a huge server melt down and we have only just got the server back online a few months ago. This is why i ask if any one would like to be admin please comment. I hope to see you on Flattened-Craft very soon.
